events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store but I want to request a refund because the size I ordered doesn't fit at all and it feels quite tight.
The customer has reported wanting to return a product due to size issues and requests a refund.
Assigning the case to customer support agent Emily for processing the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, I also need to know if the jacket has been worn or washed, and if you still have the original tags.
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I haven’t worn or washed the jacket and I still have all the original tags attached.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please pack the jacket securely and send it back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will send the jacket back tomorrow.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us!
